page.title: 11A Typical School Day
page.content: In the morning I leave home in time to reach school by nine o'clock. First the whole school meets in the hall for assembly. We then go to our separate classes and start work. We have mathematics until morning play. Now that I am learning the recorder I sometimes have to practice at playtime. Our English lesson follows playtime. In the afternoon our lessons vary. Sometimes we have Art, Games, Music, Science, History, Geography and Religious Topics. At the moment we are learning about Red Indians from a television programme. When school finishes at 3.30 I wave goodbye to my friends and walk home.
